thread.title: Dodgers' Chase Utley suspended two games
thread.title_full: Dodgers' Chase Utley suspended two games

author: Associated Press
title: Dodgers' Chase Utley suspended two games
text:
Dodgers' Chase Utley suspended two games Associated Press Posted: 10/11/2015 06:37:26 PM PDT Updated: 10/11/2015 06:48:53 PM PDT Your browser does not support iframes. Major League Baseball has suspended Los Angeles' Chase Utley for Games 3 and 4 of the N.L. Division Series, it was announced Sunday night. 
Utley broke Mets shortstop Ruben Tejada's right leg with a late slide in the Dodgers' Game 2 victory. Check back for more on this developing story. New York Mets shortstop Ruben Tejada falls after a slide by Los Angeles Dodgers' Chase Utley during the seventh inning of an NL Division Series baseball game Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015, in Los Angeles. (John McCoy/Los Angeles Daily News via AP) ( John McCoy ) Advertisement
